original_title: Videos for the Grandchildren I'll Never Have
overview: The pull of ancestry as it shifts into the present, communication across generations, heritage as it delivers you to the future, viral cooking show videos, honouring those you love, familial creativity and collaboration, moving with the geopolitical tides across Asia, cooking as a useful and caring act.
tagline: Jason Phu twists the format of a viral cooking video, with personal, plotless storytelling shot on iPhone. Conversations cross generations.
title: Videos for the Grandchildren I'll Never Have
